feed.title: 42mst-Docs
feed.subtitle: Documentation for pretty much everything I find interesting enough to write about

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome Hello everybody and welcome to my documentation site! This is going to be the place where I will put all the information that I think I´ll need in the future and know I will forget, if there is nothing written down. Maybe you will find some helpfull stuff, or maybe you just see another person stumbling over the same problems as you did :)
